Name: Whackerball
About the game: Whackerball is a twin-stick shooter roguelite with Breakout inspired mechanics. Use your paddle to keep your ball airborne and dodge enemy bullets as you defeat cute enemies. Bounce and shoot your way through the various different biomes while acquiring powerful upgrades along the way! Gameplay Unique physics based combat system with plenty of skill expression Various unlockables that change the way you play Wide range of impactful upgrades to power up each run
